authorizedContact.description: If you are an ISV registering for Branded Calling on behalf of an end user, please ensure the brand contact is an individual from the end user's company.

firstName.description: The first name of the authorized contact.
firstName.title: First Name

lastName.description: The last name of the authorized contact.
lastName.title: Last Name

mobilePhoneE164.description: The mobile phone number of the authorized contact.
mobilePhoneE164.title: Mobile Phone Number

verificationEmail.description: The verification email address of the authorized contact.
verificationEmail.title: Verification Email Address

email.description: The email address of the authorized representative.
email.title: Email Address

firstName.description: The first name of the authorized representative.
firstName.title: First Name

jobPosition.description: The job position of the authorized representative.
jobPosition.title: Job Position

lastName.description: The last name of the authorized representative.
lastName.title: Last Name

phoneE164.description: The phone number of the authorized representative.
phoneE164.title: Phone Number

brandedCaller.description: The information that will be shown on the terminating handset for outbound calls.

displayName.description: The display name to be shown on the terminating handset for outbound calls. The display name can be up to 32 characters.
displayName.title: Branded Calls Display Name

employeeCount.description: The number of employees in the business.
employeeCount.title: Business Employee Count

entityType.description: Business type can be empty or one of Sole Proprietorship, Partnership, Co-operative, Limited Liability Corporation, Non-profit Corporation, Corporation
entityType.title: Business Type

identityType.description: Whether the company is an ISV (independent software vendor) or direct customer.
identityType.title: Business Identity (ISV vs. Direct)

industry.description: Business industry should be one of AGRICULTURE, COMMUNICATION, CONSTRUCTION, EDUCATION, ENERGY, ENTERTAINMENT, FINANCIAL, GAMBLING, GOVERNMENT, HEALTHCARE, HOSPITALITY, HUMAN_RESOURCES, INSURANCE, LEGAL, MANUFACTURING, NGO, POLITICAL, POSTAL, PROFESSIONAL, REAL_ESTATE, RETAIL, TECHNOLOGY, TRANSPORTATION
industry.title: Business Industry

isSubassigned.description: Choose any one of the following values : [YES, NO]. A sub assigned phone number is where Independent Software Vendor (ISV) assigns the Twilio phone number to their end customer. If you are a direct customer, answer NO.
isSubassigned.title: Will you subassign this number to your end customers?

privacyNoticeUrl.description: The privacy notice/policy website that explains how the business collects, uses, and protects personal data.
privacyNoticeUrl.title: Privacy Notice URL

registrationAuthority.description: The registrar the business is registered with: EIN(US), DUNS, CBN(CA), CCN(CA), CRN(UK), OTHER
registrationAuthority.title: Business Registration Identifier

registrationNumber.description: The ID number of the business in the business registrar
registrationNumber.title: Business Registration Number

tradeName.description: The trade name or DBA name that the business uses to operate under that is different than the legal name.
tradeName.title: Business Trade Name

websiteUrl.description: The URL of the business website
websiteUrl.title: Website URL

useCase.description: What the branded calling products will be used for.

callVolumeDaily.description: The number of calls expected to be placed per day.
callVolumeDaily.title: Call Volume Daily

category.description: The branded calling use case category.
category.title: Use Case Category

consentDescription.description: The branded calling consent use case description.
consentDescription.title: Use Case Consent Description

description.description: The branded calling use case description.
description.title: Use Case Description

x-acceptableDocuments.description: The letter to authorize Twilio to run voice traffic on a given set of Phone Numbers.

documents.description: Letter of Authorization containing Brand Name, Tax ID, Tax country, Legal Name, Address, Phone #
